title: Endings Guide
content:
's contract and he will be free, but his father will die.

If you have Karlach in your party, she will speak up in retaliation but Mizora silences her. Now, you will get the following options:

What will happen to Wyll's powers if he breaks the pact? Save your father, Wyll. The city will need him to help rebuild. Do the right thing. Give your soul so that your father can live. Break the pact. Wyll. You deserve your freedom. Let your father die. When the city is free, you can take his place.

Cho
